Demo observed values for physical model in Northern Ireland

Source: R/demo-ni-observed-values.R
demo_ni_observed_values.Rd

A dataset containing demo observed values. Stored as .csv demo_ni_observed_values <- utils::read.csv( system.file("extdat", "ni-model-1-test-data.csv", package = "rict"), check.names = F)

Usage

demo_ni_observed_values

Format

A data frame with 24 rows and 33 variables:

SITE

Site identifier

Waterbody

Water body identifier

Year

Year of sampling

NGR

National grid letters

Easting

Easting co-ordinate

Northing

Northing co-ordinate

Altitude

Altitude in metres

Slope

Slope in metres per km

Discharge

Discharge categories

Velocity

Velocity in metres per second

Dist_from_Source

Distance from Source in km

Mean_Width

Mean Width in metres

Mean_Depth

Mean Width in metres

Alkalinity

Hardness, Calcium concentration or Electrical conductivity can be provided if unable to provide Alkalinity – One of the values must be present (spreadsheet validation)

Boulder_Cobbles

Substrate

Pebbles_Gravel

Substrate

Sand

Substrate

Silt_Clay

Substrate

Hardness

Can be provided instead of Alkalinity and follows the same validation rules (spreadsheet validation)

Calcium

Can be provided instead of Alkalinity and follows the same validation rules (spreadsheet validation)

Conductivity

Can be provided instead of Alkalinity and follows the same validation rules (spreadsheet validation)

Spr_Season_ID

season ID

Spr_TL2_WHPT_ASPT (AbW,DistFam)

ASPT

Spr_TL2_WHPT_NTaxa (AbW,DistFam)

NTAXA

Spr_Ntaxa_Bias

bias

Sum_Season_ID

season ID

Sum_TL2_WHPT_ASPT (AbW,DistFam)

ASPT

Sum_TL2_WHPT_NTaxa (AbW,DistFam)

NTAXA

Sum_Ntaxa_Bias

bias

Aut_Season_ID

season ID

Aut_TL2_WHPT_ASPT (AbW,DistFam)

ASPT

Aut_TL2_WHPT_NTaxa (AbW,DistFam)

NTAXA

Aut_Ntaxa_Bias

bias
